879620.name: Armored Train
879620.description:
Armored Train is a unique, procedurally generated adventure in the post-apocalyptic world. Under your control will be an old armored train and several crew members, but by your efforts, everything can be changed. Get equipment by killing enemies and performing various tasks. Your main goal is to get to the last functioning bunker, but how do you accomplish this task depends only on you! Each meeting with the enemy is unique, each event is unique. Because of this, each passing game will be unforgettable. Immerse yourself in this gloomy and cruel world and learn all its secrets.


Features:

  • Procedural generation in absolutely everything.
  • Freedom of choice. You are free to do whatever you want.
  • Colossal replayability - each passage is unique.
  • About 100 unique text assignments.
  • Strategic component of the game. The presence of tactical pause and a variety of different abilities that can be successfully combined.
  • The system of karma. The ability to play as a good hero and bad hero to.
  • The high difficulty of the game is due to the advanced combat system, which does not forgive mistakes.
